original_title: Hommelette for Hamlet, operetta inqualificabile (da J. Laforgue)
overview: A TV movie variation on Shakespeare's Hamlet. The movie is a part of Carmelo Bene's multi-medial project on Hamlet, also including the theatrical movie "Un Amleto di meno", a stage drama and the experimental video "Amleto di Carmelo Bene (Da Shakespeare a Laforgue).
title: Hommelette for Hamlet, operetta inqualificabile (da J. Laforgue)
